title: Where did the special shop go!?!?!?!?!?
body: There was a special shop when i opened the game this morning (you know the the 20% 70% off deals for 6 skins) and then when i relogged it was gone!!!! plz rito where did it go i got some mean deals

replies.body:
Hi

We've had to temporarily disable the personalised offers store for a little while, as we discovered an issue with it shortly after turning it on.

It should hopefully be back online later today!

Cheers
Mindstar
